summary: Cyberattacks can disrupt the transportation systems that many people and businesses rely on, like mass transit and freight rail. The TSA is responsible for protecting the nation's transportation sector. We testified about our work on TSA's efforts to address cybersecurity issues. For example, TSA has taken steps to bolster its cybersecurity workforce and meet workforce needs. But TSA could do more to reduce risks from...
title: Surface Transportation: TSA Is Taking Steps to Enhance Cybersecurity, but Additional Actions Are Needed
